class.name: StyleBoxImageMask
class.brief_description: Image mask based StyleBox, for mask test.
class.description: This StyleBox is similar to [StyleBoxTexture], but only meant to be used for mask testing. It takes an image and applies stretch rules to determine if the point clicked is masked or not.

method.name: get_expand
method.description: Return whether the expand property is set(default). When expanding, the image will use the same rules as [StyleBoxTexture] for expand. If not expanding, the image will always be tested at its original size.

method.name: get_expand_margin_size
method.description: Return the expand margin size (from enum MARGIN_*). Parts of the image below the size of the margin (and in the direction of the margin) will not expand.

method.name: get_image
method.description: Return the image used for mask testing. (see [method set_image]).

method.name: set_expand
method.description: Set the expand property (default). When expanding, the image will use the same rules as [StyleBoxTexture] for expand. If not expanding, the image will always be tested at its original size.

method.name: set_expand_margin_size
method.description: Set an expand margin size (from enum MARGIN_*). Parts of the image below the size of the margin (and in the direction of the margin) will not expand.

method.name: set_image
method.description: Set the image used for mask testing. Pixels (converted to grey) that have a value, less than 0.5 will fail the test.
